46735.<speed=0>\nとりひきの 説明です！\n<br>\n他のプレイヤーのキャ:
Here's how it works! If you offer to trade for another player's character, and they accept, you can trade that character for
items or gold... You don't want to make a deal out of the blue, but you do want to check with the other player first.

92374.とても高額なゴールドの 取り引きです！\n信頼できる相手か よく確認してください:
